REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0413 reute r f BC-ECOLOGY/ENVIRONMENT-< 03-09 0053

TEXT.TITLE: ECOLOGY/ENVIRONMENT <EEI> INITIAL OFFER STARTS
TEXT.BODY: Ecology and Environment Inc said an initial public offering of one mln common shares is under way at 15 dlrs a share. The company is selling 919,948 shares and shareholders the rest. <Prudential-Bache Securities Inc> is sole underwriter. Reuter
